title: Education on Utilizing Cloud-Based Personalized E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Short-term program to enhance cloud e-learning system utilization skills in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways on cloud-based platforms
Learners can interactively manipulate learning content using mobile-optimized e-learning tools

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
